The Ophthalmic Adaptive Optics Handbook

This handbook is a comprehensive resource for users and developers of ophthalmic adaptive optics technology at all levels of expertise.

The Handbook About Revisions
Chapters
  • Introduction
  • Geometrical optics
  • Wave optics/Diffraction
  • Polarization
  • Physiological optics
  • Retina structure and optical properties
  • Retinal imaging
  • Ophthalmic wavefront sensing
  • Ophthalmic wavefront correction
  • Ophthalmic adaptive optics
  • Online calculators
  • Optical design of ophthalmoscopes
  • Sample optical designs
  • Sample mechanical designs
  • Sample code/algorithms

Header 2

You can also include LaTeX functions. The MathJax library converts TeX and LaTeX into HTML. You can read more about it here.

    \begin{align*}
    f(x) &= x^2\\
    g(x) &= \frac{1}{x}\\
    F(x) &= \int^a_b \frac{1}{3}x^3
    \end{align*}
\begin{align*} f(x) &= x^2\\ g(x) &= \frac{1}{x}\\ F(x) &= \int^a_b \frac{1}{3}x^3 \end{align*}

Header 3

Load images from the github repo or from another source. You can add images using markdown.

# Add an image with markdown
![Average gradient of Zernike polynomials over polygons](/assets/img/polynomial_thumbnail.jpg)

You can also add images using html tags, which allow for additional styling.

<figure>
    <img src="/assets/img/polynomial_thumbnail.jpg" class="border mx-auto" alt="Alt text!"  >
    <figcaption class="text-center">Figure 1: with a border, centered</figcaption>
</figure>

Header 4

Lists can be added with markdown.

* item 1
    * subitem
* item 2
  • item 1
    • subitem
  • item 2
Header 5

Tables can be added with markdown.

| Tables        | Are           | Cool  |
| ------------- |:-------------:| -----:|
| col 3 is      | right-aligned | $1600 |
| col 2 is      | centered      |   $12 |
| zebra stripes | are neat      |    $1 |
Tables Are Cool
col 3 is right-aligned $1600
col 2 is centered $12
zebra stripes are neat $1
